NASA萬聖節禮物：調皮的南瓜太陽

03 Nov 2019, 13:30

【新唐人北京時間2019年11月03日訊】美國宇航局（NASA）在推特（Twitter）一張太陽的照片，看起來像一個被點亮的萬聖節的裝飾南瓜（jack-o-lantern）。
這張照片由太陽動力學天文臺（SDO）於2014年10月8日拍攝，顯示了太陽紫外線的情況，卻看起來像一個調皮的南瓜。
NASA說，某些區域發出的光線和能量更強，展現了太陽的表面日冕層懸浮著複雜的磁場。這張照片由波長為171和193埃（angstroms）的兩組紫外線光波組成，分別以金色和黃色代表。
NASA鼓勵公眾下載這張照片的高清圖，作為萬聖節的點綴。
──轉自《大紀元》

NASA Halloween Gift: Naughty Pumpkin Sun

03 Nov 2019, 13:30

[New Tang Dynasty, Beijing time, November 03, 2019] NASA is on Twitter a photo of the sun that looks like a jack-o-lantern of lit Halloween.
This photo was taken by the Solar Dynamics Observatory (SDO) on October 8, 2014, showing the sun's ultraviolet rays, but it looks like a naughty pumpkin.
NASA says that some areas emit more light and energy, revealing that the surface of the sun's surface is suspended by complex magnetic fields. This photo consists of two sets of ultraviolet light waves with wavelengths of 171 and 193 angstroms, represented by gold and yellow, respectively.
NASA encourages the public to download a high-resolution image of this photo as an embellishment for Halloween.
─Transfer from the Epoch Times
(Editor: Ye Ping)
